modName: Tropic Haven Islands - new tropical world - pre-Alpha PREVIEW
summary: A new tropical world with villages, multiple homes, npcs, and more.
descriptionHtml:
Modder's background:
I've been working on this mod off-and on for months (several versions have been scrapped) as I've taught myself how to work with the creation kit.  This is still a work-in-progress.
I'm seeing similar mods being released.  There were none with the same name last I checked, but I thought it might be a good idea to release this pre-alpha preview so there aren't requests to name-change later.

My goal has been to create a base tropical world using the standard assets and modder resources found on nexus.  Later, I plan to add monsters and other features from the skyrim expansions as an optional download, but that may be several months away.

This project came from my desire for 3 things:
1. tropical climate
2. some no-load houses
3. villages to watch (possibly from no-load houses)

My current to-do list:
[list][*][size=1]finish second village[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]navmesh[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]npc AI[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]lod[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]cave[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]underground village[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]sea creatures and coral[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]shipwreck and treasure[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]rock and landscape texture blending[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]monster island[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]basement for the inn?[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]grass?[/size][/*]
[*][size=1]recipes and collectable flora[/size][/*]
[/list][size=1]
[/size]
author: tcz
